Entries.summer_16: She hasn't answered any of my calls since our date...I thought it went well...$s#$b#Do you think I did something wrong..?
Entries.summer_20: Well, Haley finally called back.$s#$b#She said it wasn't gonna work out...$s#$b#...$s#$b#...@...do you think she's-$s#$b#%You stop him right there. You don't know, and it's none of your business. You tell him it's none of his business either. Besides, it wouldn't matter. She just didn't like him, end of story. Alex looks visibly upset, and turns and leaves. You sigh.
Entries.summer_21: Hey, um...I wanted to apologize for yesterday.$9#$b#I know I joked about it before, but...I'm really not used to being rejected and just wanted to make an excuse to make myself feel better...$9#$b#So I'm sorry. And thanks for kinda snapping at me. It helped.$9#$e#...I'm gonna apologize to Haley too...$9
Entries.summer_27: I saw you and Haley at the beach the other day. You guys looked great in your swimsuits!$h#$b#And I mean that in the least creepy way possible.$h#$e#I'll be honest, I've been really trying to be normal about being around women.It isn't creepy to tell a woman she looks good right?#$b#%You tell him it's not creepy if he gives the compliment, but doesn't make a big deal out of it. He nods slowly.#$b#I see. Well, I'll see you later then.$h
Entries.fall_1: So you and Haley have been hanging out more. I'll admit, I think she really like having a friend. Last time I went to the saloon, Emily said Haley's been doing pretty well lately too.$h#$b#As much as it sucks that we're not going out, it does make me happy to see her more upbeat.
Entries.fall_13: Hey, nice bracelet!$h#$b#I saw Haley wearing one too, are you guys matching? Like friendship bracelets?#$b#That's pretty cool!$h
Entries.fall_20: Heard through the grapevine that Haley's got a crush on someone...$h#$b#Think it could be me?$h#$b#Haha, kidding. I know she's way over me now.#$e#I let you know if I hear anything else.$h
Entries.winter_3: Have you noticed Haley acting kind of weird lately?$9#$b#I dunno, something's not right. I tried asking but she just brushed me off. I'm kinda worried...$9#$b#%Her oddness is not lost to you either. You have noticed she's acting odd.You tell him you're worried too, but she hasn't said anything.#$b#Damn...well, I hope she's okay.$s
Entries.winter_6: Wow. Wow, um...$7#$b#...$7#$b#...she really is a lesbian...$7#$b#...$7#$b#...I was totally right.
Entries.winter_10: I saw Haley looking at bouquets at Pierre's...think she wants to ask someone out?#$b#%You think about this...you know that you've gotten close with her, and that she's totally been a little flirty with you...maybe it's you? You say you don't know. Maybe she just liked the flowers.#$b#True, she's a pretty big fan of flowers.
Entries.winter_14: Damn! You're actually dating her?!$7#$b#I'm not gonna lie, you're pretty lucky!$7#$b#She's beautiful, smart, talented...$l#$b#Well. I'm just glad she's with someone who truly cares about her.$h#$b#Well, I hope you guys have a good run. Congrats.$h
Entries.spring_25_2: Hey, you and Haley looked great at the Flower Dance!$h#$b#You're waaay better at dancing than I am. Haley must've loved that.
Entries.summer_8_2: @, I just wanted to say that your wedding was really nice. You and Haley looked really, really happy.$h#$b#I'm really happy for you guys, and I hope married life is good to you!$h

Entries.spring_7: Hi, @!$h#$b#How are you settling into our little town? I know everyone's been all abuzz since your arrival.#$b#Well, I hope you have a wonderful day! Remember to stop and smell the flowers!$h
Entries.spring_17: My sister doesn't do much around the house, and it stresses me out a bit. I wish I knew how to get her to be more receptive.#$b#I cant even yell at mom to make her do something anymore! Not that I would now, of course.
Entries.spring_20: Ooh, the Flower Dance is in a few days! It's my sister's favorite festival!$h#$b#She's been Flower Queen for so long, I can't even remember who the last one was.#$b#I'm proud of her.
Entries.spring_27: There's a new rumor going around about me lately, and I'm not really sure what to do about it. I'm not very confrontational...$s#$b#Gus, my boss, said he heard Alex say something about me at the saloon, and I think it just kinda spread.$s#$b#%You tell her you're sorry, and that you haven't participated in any rumor spreading.#$b#Oh, I'm fine, dont worry. Rumors about me are nothing new.#$b#I'm kind of the town's weirdo, but it doesn't bother me at all. I'm true to myself and that's all that matters.$h
Entries.summer_3: The warm weather is lovely! It's my sister's favorite season, she spends so much time down at the beach.#$b#You know, if you want to hang out with her, I'd try inviting her to the beach!$h
Entries.summer_6: So, I heard a while back that you were a lesbian.#$b#I just wanted to let you know that I'm a huge supporter of the community. I'm bisexual myself, actually!$h#$b#And it doesn't bother me that those kinds of rumors are spread about me, but I know thats not the case for everyone.$u#$b#I know it's hard being queer in such a small town, So if you ever need anything, I'd be happy to be here for you!$h#$b#%You thank her, and say it's nice to have someone else like you here in town. She gives you a big hug, then waves goodbye.
Entries.summer_10: Haley told me she's got a date at the saloon in a few days. I'm surprised, she hasn't seemed interested in dating for a while. I know Alex likes her, so maybe it's with him?
Entries.summer_15: Haley wasn't doing very well after she got home last night...I came home from work and she was all bundled up on the couch, saying she just wanted me to sit with her...$s#$b#I've never seen her act like this after a date before...$s
Entries.summer_16: I feel kind of bad that I'm not really sure how to help Haley. And she won't really talk to me either, so..$s#$b#Well, I just hope she's okay. You'll let me know if you find anything out?$s#$b#%You promise you will; you care about Haley very much. Emily thanks you, then takes her leave.
Entries.summer_20: Haley's been doing better lately. She says hanging out with you has helped. I'm really glad she has a friend like you, @.$h
Entries.summer_21: I think I should do a little gardening in our planter box soon. Haley usually tends to it, believe it or not.$h#$b#She's been distracted lately, so I should probably help out. It's the least I can do!
Entries.summer_27: How are you holding up, @? You seem to being doing really well, but I just wanted to check in.#$b#%You tell her you're doing well, and that you're quickly becoming very comfortable in town.#$b#That's so great! I'm so glad to hear it!$#$b#Hey, how would you feel about coming over to meditate sometime? I could use the company.
Entries.fall_1: I've noticed you and my sister have been hanging out a lot more.#$b#Has she said anything about something bothering her? She seems rather distracted again recently...$s
Entries.fall_13: Oh!! That's my great-grandmother's bracelet! Did Haley give it to you?$h#$b#%You say that she gave it to you as a friendship bracelet...even if she did say friendship pretty weirdly.#$b#Weirdly? Huh. Maybe she was just nervous from having a new best friend.
Entries.fall_20: I see...Haley's been acting funny because she's got a new crush. She won't tell me who it is though.#$b#She's been talking to me far more often lately, so it's kind of weird she's keeping this from me.
Entries.winter_3: I'm really nervous now...Haley's been kind of cooped up for days, and she won't talk to me.$s#$b#@, do you have any clue what's wrong?$s#$b#%You tell her you have no clue, but you've also noticed she's been distant...#$b#It feels like she's getting ready to admit something big...$s
Entries.winter_6: Well, that sure solved the mystery!$h#$b#I'm so unbelievably proud of her, and I'm so happy she felt comfortable enough to tell us first!$h#$b#@, thank you for being there for my sister, it means so much to me that you're here to help support her.$h
Entries.winter_10: Hehe...I know something you don't.$h#$b#And I'm not telling!$h#$b#Haley would kill me if I did.
Entries.winter_14: I was pretty good at hiding that secret, huh?$h#$b#Welcome to the family, @, we're happy to have you!$h
Entries.spring_25_2: Awww, you two looked so adorable at the Flower Dance!$h#$b#It was hard to see because I was dancing too, but you did great, and Haley looked way happier than she was previous dances.
Entries.summer_8_2: @, I know I said welcome to the family when you started dating, but...truly, welcome to the family now.$l#$b#I sent a postcard and wedding photo to our parents, so hopefully they get the good news soon.$h
Entries.summer_20_2: I'll be honest, it does get pretty lonely now that Haley's gone, but...don't worry about me. I'm far happier that Haley is somewhere safe, with someone who loves her.

Entries.NPC.cs.3962: Oh my god, @...$h#$b#I know I was dropping crazy hints, but I was seriously *minutes* away from giving in and asking you myself!$h#$b#Thank you. I absolutely will be your girlfriend. And...$l#$b#You'll be *my* girlfriend...$l#$b#Wow...girlfriend...$8
Entries.NPC.cs.3963: Oh my god, @...$h#$b#I know I was dropping crazy hints, but I was seriously *minutes* away from giving in and asking you myself!$h#$b#Thank you. I absolutely will be your girlfriend. And...$l#$b#You'll be *my* girlfriend...$l#$b#Wow...girlfriend...$8
Entries.NPC.cs.3980: ...$8#$b#@...$8#$b#Do you really mean this..?$8#$b#%Haley looks like she's going to burst into tears.#$b#I-I can't believe this, I...$8#$b#I will absolutely marry you.$l#$b#This is...absolutely insane for me, considering a year ago I was in so much denial that it almost wasn't healthy.$7#$b#You have helped me change in so many ways, @, and it would be the biggest honor of my entire existence to be your wife.$l#$b#I love you, @. Sooooo so much.#$b#%Haley gives you a big kiss after slipping on the pendant. She hugs you tight, and you can hear her sniffle as she pulls away.#$b#Well...Mayor Lewis says these things only take about three days to set up, so...I'll see you at the altar.$l
Entries.Event.cs.1736: Awww, babe! You wanna dance with me?$h#$b#You're so sweet, you know that?$l#$b#I'll absolutely dance with you!$h
Entries.after_wedding: That was...a beautiful ceremony, @.$l#$b#I don't think I've ever been *this* happy before.$h#$b#Thank you for everything, @. I love you.$l
Entries.NPC.cs.4001: Babe, I wanted to give you that as like, a symbol of my love for you.$l#$b#Of course nothing can compare to my *actual* love, but I figured that's a close second!$h
Entries.NPC.cs.4439: I'm so nervous...$s#$b#I'm kind of worried about how much the new baby will change things. We'll be okay, right?$s
Entries.NPC.cs.4440: You know, I really hope our adoption stuff gets approved. There's so many kids out there who need a family...$s#$b#Even if that family has two moms!$h
Entries.NPC.cs.4441: I finally filed the adoption papers with our social worker!$h#$b#Hopefully everything will move through the system smoothly, and...we'll have our baby!$h
Entries.NPC.cs.4449: I'm *exhausted* lately...$s#$b#I had no idea how annoying being a parent could be sometimes...$u
Entries.NPC.cs.4452: Baby, I know you're busy with farm work and everything but I can't do this parenting thing on my own.$s#$b#Can you watch the kids while I take a bath or something? I really need alone time.$s
Entries.NPC.cs.4406: I am *so* not in a good mood...$u#$b#I think I might just stay in bed, sorry @...
Entries.NPC.cs.4462: *yawn* It was pretty nice this morning, so I tended to the crops a little. Hope it helped a little, it's about all I can do on the farm!$h
Entries.NPC.cs.4463: #$e#I also filled {0}'s water bowl.#$b#That's *also* about all I can do.$h.
Entries.MultiplePetBowls_watered: #$e#I also filled the pets' water bowls.#$b#That's *also* about all I can do.$h.
Entries.ExtraDialogue_NewChild_SecondChild1: Ahhh, look at the little family we've grown!$h#$b#I love you, @.$l
Entries.ExtraDialogue_NewChild_SecondChild2: Look how far we've come, @. Two beautiful kids...$l#$b#I couldn't be happier.$l
Entries.ExtraDialogue_NewChild_Adoption: Awww I'm so happy!! I can't believe we finally got to welcome {0} into our life.$h
Entries.ExtraDialogue_NewChild_FirstChild: Awww I'm so happy!! I can't believe we finally got to welcome {0} into our life.$h
Entries.ExtraDialogue_Mines_PlayerKilled_Spouse_: Oh my god, @! I told you to be careful!$u#$b#*sigh* Let's just get you home, okay?$s
Oh my god, @! I told you to be careful!$u#$b#*sigh* Let's just get you home, okay?$s
Entries.eventSeen_13_memory_oneweek: %Haley greets you with a smile. You notice that she's wearing her Great-Grandma's bracelet.
Entries.eventSeen_12_memory_oneweek: Hey, you look great today!$h#$b#I thought I saw you take one of my magazines, hehe...$h
Entries.eventSeen_12_memory_twoweeks: My parents sent another postcard...They're on some majorly expensive cruise, and they say me and Emily can join whenever.$s#$b#And like, good for them. But nobody wants to go on a cruise with their parents.
Entries.eventSeen_11_memory_oneweek: %Haley is humming happily to herself. She waves at you, giving you a bright smile.
Entries.eventSeen_11_memory_twoweeks: Hehe...remember our first kiss?$h#$b#I can't believe I was so nervous!$h
Entries.dating_Haley: I'm serious, I almost asked you out myself!$h#$b#Now, let's hope you don't take too long the next time you ask me an important question! *wink wink*$h
Entries.AcceptBirthdayGift_Loved: *gasp*... You got this for me? Wow, @, this is the best birthday gift ever!$h
Entries.AcceptBirthdayGift_Liked: Awwwww, you got me a birthday gift? Well, I really like it!$h
Entries.AcceptBirthdayGift_Negative: Gross! You got me this on my birthday? What's wrong with you!$a
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)StardropTea: For me? Ooooh... I can't decide if I should drink it, or use it as shampoo...
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)88: $c 0.8#Is that... coconut? I love this!$h#Mmm.... coconuts remind me of warm, sunny days at the beach. When I hold one, I feel like I'm there... even when it's raining.
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)421: How did you know these were my favorite flowers?$8#$b#Thank you so much, I love them!$h
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)221: Ohhhh my god, how did you know I was craving this?!$8#$b#Thank you! You're such a sweetheart!$h

Entries.Introduction: Oh... You're that new farmer, or whatever. Aren't you?#$e#Huh? Oh... I'm Haley.#$e#Hmm... If it weren't for those horrendous clothes you might actually be cute... Actually, never mind.$h
Entries.spring_16: Did you get a new outfit?#$b#Wait, is that same outfit from last week?$s#$b#Maybe you should borrow one of my fashion magazines...$s
Entries.dating_Haley_memory_oneday: It's actually crazy to me that I have a partner like you.. $l#$b#I still have so much to learn about what it means to be a lesbian, but you're helping me every day..$l#$b#@, you've made me so happy.$l
Entries.winter_21: I think Emily is worried about me… she keeps asking if I'm okay, if I need anything, if I want to meditate…$s#$b#I think she thinks I'm not worked up enough over my first lesbian relationship!$h#$b#Well, maybe I'll meditate with her to calm her down.
Entries.Indoor_Night_Haley: Aww, there's my big, strong, gorgeous spouse.$l#$b#You look sooo tense...$s#$b#Why don't we get to bed and I can help you...de-stress.$13
Entries.spring_23_2: Well, tomorrow's the Flower Dance.#$b#Do you think Mayor Lewis will let us both be like, Flower… Royals? Maybe you wouldn't wanna be queen, but I still wanna share my title with my awesome, beautiful partner.#$b#Yeah, there should totally be two Flower Royals.

Entries.spring_7: Hey. Newbie. I heard you were gay. #$q 30/31 spr7_followup#Does that mean I'm out of the game? #$r 30 -20 spr7_excuseme#Excuse me?! Yeah, you are absolutely out! #$r 30 0 spr7_yes#Um...yeah. Sorry. #$r 31 +30 spr7_notmytype#Yeah, sorry dude. You're not really my type, know what I mean?.
Entries.spr7_excuseme: Okay, you didn't have to bite my head off. I was joking.$a
Entries.spr7_notmytype: Ha! Good one!$h#$b#Yeah, I get it. I thought ladies couldn't resist me, but...you're not a lady either, huh?$h#$b#Guess I have some learning to do. See you around.
Entries.spr7_followup: That's pretty cool. I knew a gay guy in high school. I think he played volleyball or something.
Entries.summer_3: Hey, I wanna apologize for being kinda weird about the g-$s#$b#Sorry, *lesbian* thing.$h#$b#I looked it up online a couple days ago, some lesbians don't like being called gay, right?#$b#%You tell him it's just a matter of personal preference, and sometimes some people use them interchangably.#$b#I see. Well, I wanted to learn a little bit. I don't wanna treat you any different from anyone else, I'm not that kinda guy.#$e#So, what's it like kissing a girl as a lesbian?#$b#Kidding, kidding!!!$h#$b#See ya.
Entries.summer_27: I saw you and Haley at the beach the other day. You guys looked great in your swimsuits!$h#$b#And I mean that in the least creepy way possible.$h#$e#I'll be honest, I've been really trying to be normal about being around women and...those with boobs or something, I guess?#$b#It isn't creepy to tell a woman she looks good right?#$b#%You tell him it's not creepy if he gives the compliment, but doesn't make a big deal out of it. He nods slowly.#$b#I see. Well, I'll see you later then.$h
